Back to Kaija Saariaho

Kaija Saariaho

Prelude

2007

This is based on material from the song cycle Quatre Instants, which was originally for soprano and piano, with the accompaniment later orchestrated.

Recommended editions

  • Chester Music · CH 72534

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
